name: Numerology
description: Identify your character's five core numbers and what they suggest about their personality

attributes.name: Life Path Number
attributes.description: Add up the numbers in their date of birth (e.g. 1/1/2000 = 4) for insights into the path they are on in life

attributes.name: Destiny / Expression Number
attributes.description: Convert their full birth name into numbers using the Pythagorean chart for insights into their goals, abilities, and desires

attributes.name: Personality Number
attributes.description: Convert the consonants in their full birth name into numbers using the Pythagorean chart for insights into how others perceive them

attributes.name: Heart's Desire / Soul Urge Number
attributes.description: Convert the vowels in their full birth name into numbers using the Pythagorean chart for insights into their inner self

attributes.name: Birthday Number
attributes.description: Add up the numbers in their day of birth (e.g. 1/1/2000 = 1) for insight into their unique talents and purpose in life

attributes.name: Interpretation
attributes.description: What insight do the five core numbers provide into their personality, potential, and life's true purpose?
